attributes.action: Make British Telecom Update There Exchange Boxes To Support 30mb Broadband
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Im Paying for an internet connection thats ment to be 8mb broadband and because of BT's exchange box not updated im only getting 2Mb this is why 90% of the UK are not getting there full internet speeds all because British Telecom cannot be bothered to update there services.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
